Adjectives and adverbs are not fully developed, but rather used nominatively, yet often marked with these suffixes:

Adjectives via suffix -tig -𓍖 -𓍘𓏤 түг tüg tek түү tig 𒌓 -tag -dag tique < Tiegel 𓍘
Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒌓 -tú -tig -tag -day -utu 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒌓 le-mut-tú lemuttú evil Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒌅 -tu limut-tu 𒅆𒌨𒌅 evil Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒌈 -tu limut-tu 𒅆𒌨𒌈 evil Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒁴 tì Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒋾 -ti 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒋾 lemutti evil Adjectives via suffix -ty -𓍖 -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 的 -түү -다 high => haughty -os -ös
Adjectives via suffix -tive -𓍖 -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 prime => primitive
Adjectives via suffix -t… -𓏜 -de -的 pregnant = 𓃀 𓂓 𓁑 𓏜 -tī *-tia**
Adjectives via suffix -ti -𒋾 ⇔ -𒌅 tu ⇔ -tion
Adjectives via suffix -ti •𐀴 ti 𐘠 TI > 𔓯 I
Adjectives via suffix -y -𓇋𓇋 -𓏮 𔓯 I -y {__} -iya fun => funny -wie -ji -ij -ig -ious -ish 𒍑 uš -US -𐌰𐍃 -id
Adjectives via suffix -ia 𓇋𓇋 -ية faranchia 𔓯 I -y -iya french
Adjectives via suffix -ial 𓇋𓇋 -il(i) -ali genial 𔔹𔓯 𔗲𔓯 𔒗𔓯 ?
Adjectives via suffix -ful 𓇋𓇋 -ful 𔗷𔗲 𔗷𔔹 woeful 𓅱𓅪𓅨 -voll ⇔ faire (full paleo value)
Adjectives via suffix -il 𓇋𓇋 -il(i) infantil
Adjectives via suffix -al 𓇋𓇋 -ala -ali 𔗷𔗲 𔗷𔔹 𔗷𔒗 fanal
Adjectives via suffix -ly 𓇋𓇋 -il(i) -ali friendly
Adjectives via suffix -lich -like ly-
Adjectives via suffix -ich -ig -lig -lich -like ly-
Adjectives via suffix -ig -ique -y -𒋡 -qa que ika@Elamite Adjectives via suffix -que -𒋡 -qa -𒂵 -GA 𒆗𒂵 kraftig

𓋴 𓐍 𓎸 𓏛 | wide | ⲥⲑⲱⲛ •saçan{ik} šadanika @ Elamite √Kanne, Kanister

These forms are perfectly preserved in Turkish:
Adjectives -ty күшті küşti -tüü күчтүү kräftig күштүг küştüg -tig -ig -y
Adjectives -like -lich -lig -ly 𐰛𐰈𐰲𐰠𐰈𐰏 küčlüg كۈچلۈك küchlük -ig -y

-★hearty -artig -hath -ate -𓄣 ♡𓄤 (chicken-heart𓄣=fearful) affectionate
-tig -ty -y -𓍘𓏤 -𓏭 -𓏮 -𓇋𓇋 -ta -ed -et 𓅪⇨𓅪𓍘𓏤 ǵʰer⇨court,short
-ter -𓏛 -दार (-dār) -的 de -thern
-w -wu -u -on 𓅱 -wie -von -ive -iv -𓇋𓇋
-ious -nurwn -𓏌𓅱 -on -ion -𓏌𓅱 -URN! nord⇨ northern
-mend -mind 𓏇𓄣 -mi -mos -mo vraiment vachement (similar) -wie -wy -y 𓏇
-like -lig -lich -lieb -ly -y -ig 𓏇𓄣♡ -𓏭 -𓏮 -𓇋𓇋?
-some 𓄥
-𓅪 -vål fowl -foul -full -voll -vol -al (suffix for small, foul or evil things)
-𓅪 ★GVAL cul klein gleich equal evil villain ghoul ≠ gavilán
-𓅨 ★GVER wr very great Gefahr? ≠ gorrión

Alternative reading
Adjectives via suffix -𓅪 -bar 𓇋𓇋 -fait 𓏏𓏮

great from Proto-Indo-European gʰer- “to rub, grind, remove” *gʰrewd-
short from Proto-Indo-European ǵʰer “short” ^^ Bad Linguistics

big ⇦ bugver(t)

𓅪 gorrión gavilán 𓅫GVAL Sperling vs Sperber sparrow (hawk) Sperberbird;)
𓅪 Sperber sparrow spärlich Sperling

Examples

𓃀𓅱𓅪 bane/foul/evil

nose ⇨ nosy nosey 𓂉𓏤𓇋𓇋

fun ⇨ funny

l#IB ♡ vs like
chicken-heart𓄣=fearful
lion-heart𓄣=courageous, rageing
𓋴𓈖𓂝𓂝𓏞𓏛 𓄣𓏤 smooth♡ = © soothe, calm ⇔ 𓌃𓏞 smeißel schmeichel schmus ⇔ 𓂧𓏇𓇋𓂢 schmied smith dermis touch

fronty/frohnlieb 𓏅𓈖𓍘𓇋𓄣 fröhlich
cloud⇨cloudy𓇉𓄿𓍘𓇋𓇲

become intimate 𓅧𓈎𓂻 𓄣𓏤 shekeln@DE / fug/shag@EN / shagal@SEM ⇨ shakey

肥 féi ⇨ 肥​的 féi-de = fettig

Adjectives verbs and nomen are often interchangable
𓎛 𓇉 𓄿 𓊪 𓏛 secret, mysterious
𓎔 𓏏 𓏮 𓈇||(adj.) northern|
𓎛 𓊵 𓏏 𓊪 content, pleased, gracious
𓍑 𓄿 𓏴 𓏤 contentious
𓍍 𓅱 𓏛 𓄣 𓏤 ingenious
𓋴 𓅱 𓋴 𓐍 𓎸 𓏛 spacious
𓋴 𓃀 𓈎 𓂾 splendid
𓌴 𓏛 new (adj. and v.) neuern
𓌷 𓂝 𓏜 ||(adj. and v.) true
𓍋 𓅓 𓂋 𓅪||(adj.) sick
𓍯 𓆓 𓇆||(adj.) fortunate
𓊃 𓈙 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓅱 𓏜 secretly vs 𓊃 𓈙 𓏏 𓍔 𓏜

causative 𓋴 se

Two distinct forms tig/lig might have arisen or been reanalyzed from
𓏤 ek (-one)
de-ek (-the-one) and al-ek (-of-one)

𒍑 uš -US -𐌰𐍃 noun/adjective suffix
𒋾 ty noun/adjective suffix ⇔ tion
𓃀 𓂓 𓁑 𓏜 | be pregnant | bir.ka.nun𓁑.te𓏜
